text: The church stood in a corner of a bleak slum.
It had once been a symbol of purity and faith, a place where many people had gathered.
But after the whole district had been swallowed up by the slums, people had stopped visiting, and nowadays the church simply bared its desolate front.
And now, deep below this location, a new "Gate to the Devildom" had been discovered.

name: Incubus
text: Mistress, I have a report to make.

name: Witch
text: Oh, what is itー?
A bewitching beauty turned around at the Incubus's words.
It was the "Phantom Witch"ー
The female ninja had trapped the UFS task force and the Taimanin scouts in their illusionary worlds,
and had essentially occupied the "Gate to the Devildom," below the church.
Her goal for the moment was to buy time.
She had sided with the demons and was trying to get the "Gate to the Devildom" under the control of her faction.
Until her reinforcements came and enabled her to do that, she was planning to shut away the UFS forces and Taimanin in their "illusionary worlds" to stop them in their tracks.
Howeverー

name: Incubus
text: It seems there are some who woke up from their "dream" and are moving about freely.

name: Incubus
text: They have broken through multiple "fantasy worlds" and are steadily approachingー

name: Witch
text: My, my...?
The witch tilted her head as though she were troubled.
And then she suddenly remembered something.

name: Witch
text: Come to think of it, "that kid" was among the Taimanin troops that came here to investigate, isn't that right?♪
The young Taimanin who saw through the illusion of the haunted castle with his strange Ninja Art.
With his ability, such a feat might have been possibleー

name: Incubus
text: Mistress, how shall we proceed?

name: Witch
text: Right, let's see...

name: Witch
text: It will take time for the reinforcements to arriveーthat means it'll be troublesome if we let them wander around, you know?
The witch smiled enchantingly and began to weave a new illusion.
